trans-unit.source: {G}: Questing Phelddagrif gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target opponent creates a 1/1 green Hippo creature token. {W}: Questing Phelddagrif gains protection from black and from red until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life. {U}: Questing Phelddagrif gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent may draw a card.
